thread.title: Gorillaz Announce Album "Humanz," Share Release Date & Tracklist
thread.title_full: Gorillaz Announce Album "Humanz," Share Release Date & Tracklist

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Gorillaz Announce Album "Humanz," Share Release Date & Tracklist
text:
Home > Music > Gorillaz Announce Album "Humanz," Share Release Date & Tracklist Gorillaz Announce Album "Humanz," Share Release Date & Tracklist 4 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz  15pm Gorillaz reveal "Humanz," share FOUR new songs. 
Gorillaz has revealed the title ( Humanz ) and release date (April 28th) of its upcoming album, as well as the cover art and full tracklist. 
Humanz will feature appearances from Danny Brown , De La Soul, Popcaan, Anthony Hamilton , D.R.A.M., Pusha T , Kali Uchis, Kelela, Grace Jones, Mavis Staples, and more. Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlitt recorded in London, Paris, New York, Chicago, and Jamaica. 
Four songs from the album have been released internationally on Apple Music and will be available on all platforms tomorrow. Check out the tracklist and listen to those below. 
Tracklist: 
01 Ascension feat. Vince Staples 02 Strobelite feat. Peven Everett03 Saturnz Barz feat. Popcaan04 Momentz feat. De La Soul05 Submission feat. Danny Brown and Kelela06 Charger feat. Grace Jones07 Andromeda feat. D.R.A.M.09 Carnival feat. Anthony Hamilton10 Let Me Out feat. Mavis Staples and Pusha T11 Sex Murder Party feat. Jamie Principle and Zebra Katz12 She’s My Collar feat. Kali Uchis13 Hallelujah Money feat. Benjamin Clementine14 We Got The Power feat. Jehnny Beth 
Deluxe edition bonus tracks: 
15 The Apprentice feat. Rag’n’ Bone Man, Zebra Katz, and RAY BLK16 Halfway To The Halfway House feat. Peven Everett17 Out Of Body feat. Kilo Kish, Zebra Katz, and Imani Vonshà18 Ticker Tape feat. Carly Simon and Kali Uchis19 Circle Of Friendz feat. Brandon Markell Holmes
